Synopsis: A dozen people and their myriad problems descend upon a quiet Los Angeles park at lunch hour. April (Dagney Kerr) comes to commit suicide but can't quite get it right. Peggy (Ricki Lake) and her best friend, Claire (Cheri Oteri), seek to humiliate Dennis (William Baldwin), Peggy's philandering husband, while co-workers Nathan (Trent Ford) and Babar (Maulik Pancholy) are determined to convince their female colleagues that they do indeed enjoy eating lunch in the nude.
Title: Park
